title: Gok Wan clashes with brutal maid-of-honour on Say Yes To The Dress
text:
Gok Wan was shocked by the blunt critiques of maid-of-honour Sara (Picture: TLC)

Gok Wan met his match on Say Yes To The Dress, in the form of a brutally honest maid-of-honour who told her best friend that she could see cellulite through a figure-hugging lace dress.

Bride-to-be Mel appeared on the reality show with just 71 days to go before her wedding.

The Lancashire native had already bought a dress for the big day, but was on the hunt for a new one, admitting that in her last hunt she tried on 15 bridal gowns and was still left unsatisfied.

Along for the ride was the ruthless Sara, who shocked the presenter with her full-barreled criticism of a gown her friend showed off in the episode.

Bride-to-be Mel had previously tried 15 other dresses for her big day (Picture: TLC)

‘How can I put this without being awful,’ the maid-of-honour said visibly sighing.

‘Your stomach is really flat in it, it’s not about your stomach. But behind I can see dimples in your legs and your bum.’

The brutally honest critique definitely shocked Gok, who tried to quell the rising tension in the room by pointing out that Sara could have just been looking at creases in the dress and not the possible cellulite.

This theory is met with a very quick and decisive ‘no’ from Sara, who admits that ‘Gok’s probably never met anyone like me’.

Gok certainly had his work cut out for him (Picture: TLC)

We think you’re right about that one!

Luckily, however, there were happy endings all around, as Gok managed to find the perfect dress for Mel and it even got Sara’s stamp of approval, with sighs of relief all around.

‘You ain’t got no dimples!’ Sara tells her best friend as she shows off her dream dress.

‘You won’t even have to wear fat pants!’

We love it when a plan (finally) comes together.

Gok is now a dab-hand at making brides’ dreams come true, he even helped a blind bride featured on the show see the sparkles on her wedding dress.
